title: Fashion History Mystery #32: A Brief History of the Codpiece
itunes:title: Fashion History Mystery #32: A Brief History of the Codpiece
description:
One of the more curious items of masculine dress history, this week we explore the function and symbolism of the codpiece.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
